name: Notebook Heroes
description:
This is an early test version of the game Notebook Heroes. This game was done during the winter quarter session of VGDC at UC Irvine. 

There are currently many things in progress and not a ton of art assets.  Hopefully, we will have more things done soon.

KNOWN BUGS:

Characters sometimes move after they die (I was up too late to fix this)

Flickering death (characters are supposed to like erase with a shader but its broken right now)

Use the arrow keys or W and S to aim the archer tower and use the onscreen buttons to spawn in units.  Use the button In the top left to upgrade the resource regeneration or press U.

Defeat the enemy castle before they defeat you! Get your troop the green square lol before they get one into your red square.
